translations: [医]病房（ward 的复数）；守卫；受监护的未成年人；监禁
守卫；避开（ward 的第三人称单数形式）

sentences.sentence: You can see the no smoking sign—we don't allow smoking in the wards, and the same goes for alcohol.
sentences.translation: 你可以看到禁止吸烟的标志，因为我们不允许在病房吸烟，也不允许喝酒。

sentences.sentence: "When I entered the wards, I was kind of frozen and felt like I couldn't move," he said.
sentences.translation: 他说：“我进到病房时有点冻僵了，感觉动弹不得。”

sentences.sentence: I had resolved to stay, and never more venture country-wards--but the accident has ended that.
sentences.translation: 我已经决定留下来，再也不往乡下去了——可是发生了案子，这一切都结束了。
